name: Booch & Brew
address: Manor House Farm, Station Rd, Dunham Massey, Altrincham WA14 5SG
description: We make Craft brewed Kombucha in Altrincham, Booch & Brew Kombucha is made with loose-leaf tea, organic cane sugar and our house SCOBY, a Symbiotic Culture of Bacteria and Yeast. Our bubbles with benefits soft drink is simply delicious and perfect for those looking for an adult soft drink which tastes wonderful, is low in sugar and also great for your gut.
